short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your online interactions with unique NFT emotes! Exchange and display exclusive NFT emotes on your favorite websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your online interactions with unique NFT emotes! This add-on allows you to exchange and display exclusive NFT emotes on your favorite websites, adding a personal and creative touch to your digital communications. Easily integrate and manage your emotes for a more expressive online experience.
